info.name: ♡(Roblox) Pastel Blue Sky♡
info.description: A cute cartoon-ish sky background with pastel blue details for your roblox page! (In case you don't see the Settings button in the screenshot, don't worry, when you download it's still there! Also, the pink lines are a bug, when you download they disappear)
